subGroups.title: CCSS.ELA-Literacy.WHST.6-8.1b
subGroups.name: Supporting Claims
subGroups.description: Write arguments to support claims with clear reasons and relevant evidence
subGroups.info: Support claim(s) with logical reasoning and relevant, accurate data and evidence that demonstrate an understanding of the topic or text, using credible sources.

items.title: Core Cadet
items.info: Student has completed greater than 15 Claim Cores with a high success rate!

items.title: Core Champion

items.title: Bot Defender

subGroups.title: CCSS.ELA-Literacy.WHST.6-8.1a
subGroups.name: Organizing Claims
subGroups.description: Write arguments focused on discipline-specific content
subGroups.info: Introduce claim(s) about a topic or issue, acknowledge and distinguish the claim(s) from alternate or opposing claims, and organize the reasons and evidence logically.
